entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
